About

Hi, this is Yuhan. I am a PhD student at New York University, majored in Electrical and Computer Engineering.

HuskyDev is my personal blog, where I share my research projects and learning notes (mainly in math and CS). I also share some programming projects as my personal interest.

Feel free to leave a comment or reach me by:
